name: Kogukhpak
description: The Kogukhpak is a Huge demon characterized by its immense size and chaotic evil nature, with a fearsome presence enhanced by its Strength and Charisma.
memorable: Its ability to deal devastating damage with powerful physical attacks and magical fire breath makes it a terrifying opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to sow chaos and destruction, overpowering foes with brute strength and magical abilities.
relations: Related to other chaotic demons; could serve or oppose powerful entities within the Abyss.
environment: Commonly found in dark, chaotic realms, possibly in places corrupted by evil or near battlefields.
strengths: Holds strong immunities to cold, fire, and poison, along with resistance to lightning and non-magical physical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and suffers from sunlight hypersensitivity, reducing its effectiveness outdoors during the day.
attacks: Deals powerful melee damage with Bite and Gore attacks, as well as ranged fire damage through Spit Fire.
most_powerful_ability: The Fire Breath can unleash a torrent of flames in a large area, inflicting massive damage.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, enhancing its ability to perceive hidden or invisible creatures.
skills: Has a decent perception capability with a Wisdom score of 16, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can leap long distances, delivering damage upon landing.
Grapples targets with powerful Bite attack.
Strong physicality with a Strength of 30 for devastating melee hits.
Developed presence with a Charisma of 20, influencing interactions.
test_queries: powerful creature from the abyss with truesight
demon vulnerable to radiant damage in sunlight
